Isabella Rodriguez.description: preparing for the Potluck and organizing dishes for tomorrow's event (preparing utensils and plates for the potluck) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:kitchen sink

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about the logistics of reviewing research articles at the library and meeting for breakfast at Hobbs Cafe @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Hey Klaus! How's your research paper coming along?
Hey Maria! My research paper is coming along well. I've been outlining the structure and gathering materials. How about you?
That's great to hear, Klaus! I'm almost done with my part too.
Would you like to review our research articles together at the library tomorrow?
Sure, Klaus! I'd love to review our research articles together at the library tomorrow. What time works best for you?
9 am works for me, see you there!
Great, I'll see you at 9 am tomorrow to review our research articles at the library. Looking forward to it!
By the way, are we still meeting at Hobbs Cafe for breakfast before heading to the library?
Yes, we can still meet at Hobbs Cafe for breakfast before heading to the library.
Sounds like a plan! I'll see you at 8 am at Hobbs Cafe for breakfast.
I'll make sure to bring my notes on the conclusion and the research articles we need to discuss tomorrow.
Should I bring my laptop to the library for reviewing the research articles?
Yes, bringing your laptop would be helpful for reviewing the research articles.
Great! I'll make sure to bring my laptop with me to the library tomorrow.
Also, do you need any help with setting up your streaming equipment?
